fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: - Choose one person each night and use your technological prowess to hack their devices and steal sensitive information from them. This will cause them to die of shock.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are immune to any role blocking or transportation abilities.
- You can discover a player's role by hacking into their device.
- You have the ability to plant fake evidence that reveals a player as a different role. This ability can be used 3 times.
- If you successfully hack into the device of an Investigator, Sheriff, or Spy, you will plant false evidence that will provide incorrect investigative results.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone who opposes you. You win once you are the last one standing.
